channel.title: Comments on: The Grinning Plowman “Radiator” mp3

item.title: By: Janet
item.dc:creator: Janet
item.description:
I was the bass player for the Plowman for about 8 yrs. and not even our closest friends, or the occasional new guitarist, ever knew that Michael was not only my lover for 15 yrs., he was actually my step brother for most of our childhood.
If you listen to his music this should explain 99% of his lyrics.
item.content:encoded:
I was the bass player for the Plowman for about 8 yrs. and not even our closest friends, or the occasional new guitarist, ever knew that Michael was not only my lover for 15 yrs., he was actually my step brother for most of our childhood.

If you listen to his music this should explain 99% of his lyrics.

item.title: By: John
item.dc:creator: John
item.description:
I have all 3 of there albums; if anyone is looking for them, or a song they might like to have?
Unfortunately, I never got to see them live, but I'm in a band w/ their old guitarist, Mark ("I Play Jupiter") & got to jam once with, Derek - which was a thrill for me b/c I was/am a big fan of GP!
Here's my bands website (DMDT) if anyone is interested in checking us out:
http://www.myspace.com/dmdtmusik
item.content:encoded:
I have all 3 of there albums; if anyone is looking for them, or a song they might like to have?

Unfortunately, I never got to see them live, but I’m in a band w/ their old guitarist, Mark (“I Play Jupiter”) & got to jam once with, Derek – which was a thrill for me b/c I was/am a big fan of GP!

Here’s my bands website (DMDT) if anyone is interested in checking us out:

http://www.myspace.com/dmdtmusik

item.title: By: Johnny
item.dc:creator: Johnny
item.description: I used to know one of those guys, Derrick, and trust me when I say, they were odd!!
item.content:encoded: I used to know one of those guys, Derrick, and trust me when I say, they were odd!!

item.title: By: Robert
item.dc:creator: Robert
item.description: And then there was that Jehovah's Witness who was a heroin addict and wanted to play on Spiderman's Web. Oh, yes, those were the days.
item.content:encoded: And then there was that Jehovah’s Witness who was a heroin addict and wanted to play on Spiderman’s Web. Oh, yes, those were the days.

item.title: By: Eric Greenwood
item.dc:creator: Eric Greenwood
item.description: you and i went to several shows that the grinning plowman played, if memory serves. and i think we missed clockhammer by minutes at one of those 91 ROCK benefits.
item.content:encoded: you and i went to several shows that the grinning plowman played, if memory serves. and i think we missed clockhammer by minutes at one of those 91 ROCK benefits.

item.title: By: Robert
item.dc:creator: Robert
item.description: I have a copy I can burn for you. I remember those days like they were...twenty years ago.
item.content:encoded:
I have a copy I can burn for you.
I remember those days like they were…twenty years ago.
